MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW6 postcode area of Tarporley, affecting properties in Peckforton, Sparstow and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:39PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by suspected third party damage. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 5:45PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:41PM on 28th October 2020.
